Question: Hucasystem Inc. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
HUCASYSTEM Inc.

HUCA GTR System

- End-effector-based gait rehabilitation device
- Provides natural gait pattern and optimal gait training effect for Upper Limb and Lower Limb
- Robot-assisted technology for neurological and orthopedic patients
- Intended to offer high-quality gait rehabilitation services
- Developed using advanced robotic technology
- Designed to induce normal motion for patients to walk normally
- Exporting rehabilitation system robots and entering the global market through partnership with Fourier Intelligence-Robotics
- Participated in International Conference of the Korean Academy of Rehabilitation Medicine (KARM 2023)
Summary_cn:
华卡系统有限公司

华卡 GTR 系统

- 基于末端执行器的步态康复设备
- 为上肢和下肢提供自然的步态模式和最佳的步态训练效果
- 用于神经学和骨科患者的机器人辅助技术
- 旨在提供高质量的步态康复服务
- 采用先进的机器人技术开发
- 旨在诱导患者正常行走的正常动作
- 通过与富利尔智能-机器人的合作，出口康复系统机器人并进入全球市场
- 参加韩国康复医学学会国际会议 (KARM 2023)
